api_list.name: Get Stream
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://razorcloud-xtream1.p.rapidapi.com/player_api.php?username=xtapi&password=xtapi&action=get_live_streams"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "razorcloud-xtream1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
